bwwExcerpt: : Cott, who plays Kevin Keller on the CW's dark and edgy take on the Archie Comics, is a delight to watch onstage as he showcases another of his talents. The fresh-faced young actor has a bright singing voice and imbues his character with vulnerability and vibrant newfound energy, when Tommy's finally free.
